return Object.keys($$$)

$$$.inited = () => $$.state
$$$.loadjson = async () =>
  await load(JSON.parse(await (await fetch("101.json")).text()))
$$$.current = async () => log(await read($$.name))

$$$.isstr = v => typeof v === "string"
$$$.isobj = v => typeof v === "object"
$$$.isfct = v => typeof v === "function"
$$$.isarr = Array.isArray
$$$.isnth = v => v===undefined || v==null
//我就不该设计个这么长的名字的 $$$ 要按三下

document.body.onclick = () => { forward() }
document.body.oncontextmenu = e => { backward(), e.preventDefault() }

const _upage = (e, v) => isobj(v)
  ? style(e, v) : isstr(v) ? e.innerText = v : 0
const upage = o=> d=> forin(o, (e, k, v = d[k])=> isnth(v) ? 0
  : isarr(v) ? forof(v, v => _upage(e, v)) : _upage(e, v))
const init = o=>_=>forin(o, e=>e.removeAttribute("style"))
$$$.defpage= (n, o)=> ($["pi"+n] = init(o),
  $["p"+n] = upage(o), $["pf"+n] = f=>f(o))

skip(inited)
style(document.body, {width:"100%", height:"100%"})
$$$.body = document.body.attachShadow({mode:"open"})

skip(inited)
style(document.html, {overflow:"hidden"})
style(document.body, {position:"relative", userSelect:"none"})
style(document.body, {background:"#745f65", color:"white"})

css(".page", { width:"100%" })
css(".page", {textAlign:"center", position:"absolute"})
css(".page", {transition:"all 0.5s"})
css(".content", {transition:"all 0.5s"})
css(".inline", {display:"inline"})
css(".absolute", {postion:"absolute"})

skip(inited)
const top = dom("div", {class:"page", parent:body})

$.init1 = () => { $.pi1(), $.pi2()

$.p1({ t:"env.js 101", 
    subt1:"——",
    subt2:"交互式开发",
    subt3:"工具介绍",
       i1:"vscode ?",
       i2:"chrome devtools ?",
       i3:"某种语言的交互式命令环境?",
       i4:"我很想简单地回答它们属不属于交互式开发，" +
"但那无益于介绍这个概念，让我们换种思路，暂时忘记我们熟悉的所有开发工具，" +
"从基本的东西开始思考……",
       au:"ch3coohlink@2021"})
$.p2({
  t:"交互是什么？",
  t2:"为什么交互可以发生？",
  i1:"交互，就是我们控制计算机的方式。",
  i2:"点一下按钮是交互",
  i3:"按一下键盘是交互",
  i4:"触摸一下手机屏幕，当然也是交互",
})

let i = {textAlign:"left", margin:"150vh 10%", fontSize:"3em"}
$.p1({
  top: {top:"30%"},
  t: {fontSize:"10em", height:220, overflow:"hidden"},
  subt: {fontSize:"3em", textAlign:"right", margin:"1em 10%"},
  i1:i, i2:i, i3:i, i4:i, //这样还是有点麻烦
  subt1: {fontSize:"1em"},
  au: [{fontSize:"2em", textAlign:"right", margin:"3em 10%"},
       {height:"2em", overflow:"hidden"}],
})
i = { margin:"150vh 10%", fontSize:"2.5em",height:50, overflow:"hidden"}
$.p2({
  top: {top:"200vh"},
  demo: {width:500, heigth:500},
  t: {fontSize:"9em", height:200, overflow:"hidden"},
  t2: {fontSize:"9em", height:0, overflow:"hidden"},
  i1:i, i2:i, i3:i, i4:i
})
}

$.init1()
$$.state = "init"

$.p1({
  t: {height:0},
  au: {height:0},
  subt: {fontSize:"7em", margin:"1em 20%"},
  subt1: {fontSize:0},
  subt3:"是什么？"
})

$.p2({i1: "因为你的每个操作，都有程序员为它写好了相应的代码。" })
$.p2({i1:{height:50}, i2:"当你点击关闭按钮，窗口之所以消失，那是因为程序员为你准备了使窗口消失的程序" })
$.p2({i2:{height:50}, i3:"反过来说，如果没有人为你编写对应的功能，你就做不到相应的事情。" })
$.p2({i3:{height:50}, t:"这意味着什么？"})

$.p2({i1: "这意味着所有的交互，本质上是编程。" })
$.p2({i1:{height:50}, i2:"程序是一个状态的集合，交互，实际上是在改变其中的状态。" })
$.p2({i2:{height:50}, i3:"而改变程序状态最有效的，也是唯一的工具，就是编程。" })
$.p2({i3:{height:50}, i4:"这引发了关于交互式开发的思考。"})
